title.rendered: Best of the Best + Closed July 4

content.rendered:
Gottwals Books is the Best of the Best

Thank you for voting Gottwals Books #1 in Warner Robins and #2 in Macon!
Check out the Best of the Best results.

Chick-fil-A Visited Kid’s Corner

We had so much fun with Chick-fil-A this week at Kid’s Corner. We had great readers, ice cream coupons, and a special visit from Kid Cow!

We will have Kid’s Corner at 10:30 a.m. on July 5 in Warner Robins and July 7 in Macon.

Closed July 4

We will be CLOSED on Monday, July 4. Regular business hours will resume on July 5.

excerpt.rendered: Thank you for voting Gottwals Books #1 in Warner Robins and #2 in Macon! We will be CLOSED on Monday, July 4. Regular business hours will resume on July 5.
